inputs.name: SendGridAPIKey
inputs.label: SendGgrid API Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Generate your API Key from the SendGrid Portal

inputs.name: senderEmailAddress
inputs.label: Sender E-mail Address
inputs.helpMarkDown: E-mail address of the sender. The value can either be only the E-mail Address (Eg. alex.johnson@example.com)

inputs.name: recipientEmailAddress
inputs.label: Recipient E-mail Address(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: E-mail address(s) of the recipient(s). Use a comma (,) separated list if you have multiple e-mail addresses. (Eg. alex.johnson@example.com, jamie.lee@example.com) or the Name and the E-mail Address (Eg. Alex Johnson <alex.johnson@example.com>, Jamie Lee <jamie.lee@example.com>)

inputs.name: ccEmailAddress
inputs.label: CC E-mail Address
inputs.helpMarkDown: E-mail address(s) of the cc recipient(s). Use a comma (,) separated list if you have multiple e-mail addresses. (Eg. alex.johnson@example.com, jamie.lee@example.com) or the Name and the E-mail Address (Eg. Alex Johnson <alex.johnson@example.com>, Jamie Lee <jamie.lee@example.com>)

inputs.name: bccEmailAddress
inputs.label: BCC E-mail Address
inputs.helpMarkDown: E-mail address(s) of the bcc recipient(s). Use a comma (,) separated list if you have multiple e-mail addresses. (Eg. alex.johnson@example.com, jamie.lee@example.com) or the Name and the E-mail Address (Eg. Alex Johnson <alex.johnson@example.com>, Jamie Lee <jamie.lee@example.com>)

inputs.name: emailBodyText
inputs.label: E-mail Body text
inputs.defaultValue: SendGrid E-mail from Azure DevOps Pipeline
inputs.helpMarkDown: E-mail body text. HTML tags are allowed. This input is required if 'Text' is selected for E-mail Body.

inputs.name: emailBodyFilePath
inputs.label: E-mail Body File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the file containing the e-mail body. This input is required if 'File' is selected for E-mail Body.

inputs.name: sendAsHTML
inputs.label: Send as HTML
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check to send the e-mail as HTML.
